item.title: Personal Blog
item.description: Overview This is personal blog power by hugo hosted on github pages Setup procedure On MacBook install hugo brew install hugo Create a new site hugo new site [project-name] Choose a theme we can either git clone or git submodule, since we might want to customize the theme later on, we choose to git clone git clone https://github.com/rhazdon/hugo-theme-hello-friend-ng.git themes/hello-friend-ng mv themes/hello-friend-ng/exampleSite/* ./ rm content/posts/* Create a new post hugo new posts/my-first-post.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a personal blog powered by hugo, using hello-friend-ng theme The Git Repo for this blog locates at GitHub.
